statements: SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, result FROM research_data WHERE experiment_name = 'Experiment A';
SELECT research_topic, experiment_date FROM research_data ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT id, experiment_name, researcher_name FROM research_data WHERE research_topic = 'Biology';
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM research_data ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT id, experiment_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE researcher_name='John Doe';
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, AVG(LENGTH(result)) AS avg_result_length FROM research_data GROUP BY researcher_name;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT research_topic) AS num_research_topics FROM research_data;
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_date, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE result LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT experiment_name, results FROM research_data WHERE experiment_date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM research_data ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property WHERE inventor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT invention_name, patent_number FROM intellectual_property ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT experiment_name, results FROM research_data ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property WHERE inventor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT experiment_name, COUNT(*) AS experiment_count FROM research_data GROUP BY experiment_name;
SELECT * FROM research_data INNER JOIN intellectual_property ON research_data.id = intellectual_property.id;
SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_name FROM research_data;
SELECT ip_name, ip_type, ip_description FROM intellectual_property;
SELECT experiment_id, result_description, result_date FROM experiment_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, result_description FROM experiment_results WHERE result_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM research_data WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM experiment_results WHERE result_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT ip_name, ip_description FROM intellectual_property WHERE ip_type = 'patent'
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_name FROM research_data
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_description, results FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT scientist_name, specialization FROM scientists WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' AND experiment_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT project_name, scientist_name FROM research_projects JOIN publications ON research_projects.project_id = publications.project_id JOIN scientists ON publications.scientist_id = scientists.scientist_id WHERE specialization = 'Biology';

SELECT project_name, COUNT(publication_id) AS total_publications FROM research_projects LEFT JOIN publications ON research_projects.project_id = publications.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_publications > 0 ORDER BY total_publications DESC;

SELECT scientist_name, SUM(experience_years) AS total_experience FROM scientists JOIN publications ON scientists.scientist_id = publications.scientist_id GROUP BY scientist_name ORDER BY total_experience DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM research_ideas;
SELECT submitter_name, idea_description FROM research_ideas;
SELECT idea_description, submission_date FROM research_ideas ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, result_text FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, research_field FROM researchers WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_ideas;
SELECT idea_description, submitter_name FROM research_ideas WHERE submitter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, research_field FROM researchers ORDER BY research_field DESC;
SELECT idea_id, patent_description, patent_owner FROM patents WHERE patent_owner LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT experiment_id, result_text, result_measurements FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2021-01-01';
